descript.abstract: This layer shows all of the current snowmobile trails open to the public in Minnesota, regardless of funding source.
descript.purpose: This shapefile represents the state monitored snowmobiling opportunities, including trails within state parks, state forests and other state owned lands. The data also shows snowmobile trails funded through the Grant-In-Aid Snowmobile system.

timeperd.current: Time Period of Content date indicates the date which the user can be confident of accuracy and completeness of the dataset. Collected via GPS equipment or aerial photo referenced and reviewed by regional staff.

idinfo.accconst: Open to public use, no restrictions.
idinfo.useconst: Specific Constraint - This dataset is not to be used for navigation and is a reference layer only.

citeinfo.title: Snowmobile Interactive Mapping DNR web site Snowmobile GPS Product, Garmin IMG file and KML file. Snowmobile trail cahnge point file

dataqual.logic: Data have been checked for consistency using ArcGIS 10 tools. Tests of Valid Values, General Tests for Graphic Data, Specific Topological Tests.

horizpa.horizpar: Data Source - HUD = 1:100,000 to 1:2400 GPS = +- 3 meters

procstep.procdesc: The original line data was gathered from the interpretation of snowmobile trails drawn on the MNDOT County map sheet series, roughly 1:190000. With every advancing year the data has been corrected through better attention to detail, GPS data and geoprocessing tools.

attracc.attraccr: HUD data source +-61 meters (roughly 200 feet) GPS data source +-3 meters (roughly 9 feet)

enttyp.enttypd: Within this attribute table is the trail number, trail name, and trail administrator name for the 2012-2013 Minnesota Snowmobile Trail System. Field names below refer to the actual names of fields in the attribute table; displayed field names (aliases) are defined in the field definition where applicable.

attr.attrdef: Holds the geometry for the feature.
Field alias: Trail Number. Unique snowmobile trail number and associated to applied GIA contract.
Field alias: Trail Name. Name of snowmobile trail.
Field alias: Miles. Length of trail in miles.
Field alias: Trail Administrator. Snowmobile club that administers the trail.
Length of line feature in meters.

overview.eaover: Snowmobile attribute data providing trail number, name, total number of miles and the entity that maintains the trail.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html

stdorder.ordering: Please visit the download page for this dataset on the Minnesota Geospatial Commons website using the web link below (Online Linkage).

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team
